channel.title: Cache for ErasedPkz help?
channel.description:
Hello Mopar, I was wondering if it was possible to change it so the Cache isn't in the C:/ Drive because it's kind of annoying people having to manually download it each time and place it there. So i was wondering if it was possible to put it in the client folder ?
Thanks

item.title: Cache for ErasedPkz help?
item.dc:creator: @Web_developer Web developer
item.description:
@Web_developer wrote:

[quote=“DefinateX, post:5, topic:409637”][quote author=Web developer link=topic=510912.msg3707608#msg3707608 date=1313128276]
No follow a tutorial, and yes but just use a free webhost and upload the .zip cache to some free webhost like x10hosting.com
[/quote]

I uploaded it to dropbox.com

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

It’s not working atm[/quote]
Problem is?

Read full topic

item.title: Cache for ErasedPkz help?
item.dc:creator: @DefinateX DefinateX
item.description:
@DefinateX wrote:

[quote=“Web developer, post:2, topic:409637”][quote author=DefinateX link=topic=510912.msg3707599#msg3707599 date=1313127933]
Hello Mopar, I was wondering if it was possible to change it so the Cache isn’t in the C:/ Drive because it’s kind of annoying people having to manually download it each time and place it there. So i was wondering if it was possible to put it in the client folder ?

Thanks
[/quote]

It is but I highly won’t recommend it and instead of manually doing that download cache and extract to c:/ just make a autoCachedowloader and be sure it has Signlink[/quote]

Okay and is it hard to have this autoCacheDownloader ?

Do you host it off a site?

Read full topic

item.title: Cache for ErasedPkz help?

[quote=“DefinateX, post:1, topic:409637”]Hello Mopar, I was wondering if it was possible to change it so the Cache isn’t in the C:/ Drive because it’s kind of annoying people having to manually download it each time and place it there. So i was wondering if it was possible to put it in the client folder ?

Thanks[/quote]

It is but I highly won’t recommend it and instead of manually doing that download cache and extract to c:/ just make a autoCachedowloader and be sure it has Signlink
